🕹️Instructions

Click / Tap anywhere on the screen to put one Coin 💲 into the Slot Machine and start Spinning 🎲 the reels.

Click / Tap again to stop one reel. You need at least 3 consecutive equal figures to win a percentage of the Jackpot 💎.

Check how much each combination of figures is worth in the Pay Table 🏆.

Enable / Disable sound 🔊 and vibration 🍆 with the buttons below.
